content.heroSection:
Smithfield, NC Auto Accident Lawyers

If you are suffering from injuries you sustained in a vehicle accident that wasn’t your fault, you are entitled to compensation but, unfortunately, it can be hard to get insurance companies to pay up! 

When you work with the Smithfield auto accident lawyers of Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, you can rely on our fierce advocacy to get you what you deserve and need to heal. If you have been involved in an accident through no fault of your own, we can assess what you are owed and go after it (in court, if necessary) while you take time to recover with peace of mind. 

Reach out to schedule a free initial consultation and learn how we can help you get the compensation you deserve. 

Cases Our Smithfield Auto Accident Lawyers Can Help You Resolve

Our Smithfield auto accident lawyers handle a number of types of accidents. There is no singular type of vehicular accident and all of them have different details at their centers which could potentially complicate your case. For example, if you have had an accident with a commercial vehicle, the company might seek to protect themselves by discrediting you. 

In addition to typical accidents between drivers, here is a representative selection of the cases we handle:

  • Truck accidents (including semis, tractor trailers, and other commercial vehicles)
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Drunk driving accidents
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Bicycle accidents
  • Hit and runs
  • Accidents caused by uninsured drivers
  • Accidents involving emergency vehicles
  • Accidents involving public or mass transportation 
  • And others!

If you have been involved in one of these types of accidents, we can help you seek the damages you are owed. 

Compensation We Can Help You Seek

If you are involved in a car accident, one of the first things you need to know is that you should never admit fault. If you admit any degree of fault, you will not be eligible for compensation according to North Carolina law. Even if you are concerned that you might have been somewhat at fault, never say so! Instead, you need to consult with our Smithfield auto accident lawyers in order to ascertain the details and what you are or are not owed. 

If you are in a crash, we will investigate what caused the crash, gather evidence, reach out to insurance companies, assess what damages you are owed, and go after them in court if that’s what it takes. We seek compensation for the following:

  • Hospitalization and related medical bills
  • Surgery
  • Exams
  • X-rays, MRIs, etc.
  • Ambulatory transport
  • Medications
  • Medical devices
  • Lost wages 
  • Vehicle repair or replacement 
  • And more!

Insurance companies will try to minimize the damage you have suffered, so it’s essential that you have legal counsel who can fight back to get what you are owed. You deserve time to rest and recover instead of worrying about complicated legal processes. We take those concerns off of your plate so that you have time to heal. 

Vasquez Law Firm Has Your Back

Thanks to our over 35 years of combined legal experience, the lawyers of Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, have the knowledge you need to pursue the compensation you are owed. You don’t deserve to suffer because of the negligent actions of others, and you don’t deserve to have this sort of stress dogging you as you go through the process of healing. If you have experienced an auto accident, reach out to us today to schedule a free initial consultation and learn how we can help you get back on your feet. 

Frequently Asked Questions

Should I accept the insurance company’s settlement?

Consult with your legal counsel before accepting a settlement from the insurance company. Insurance companies might try to offer you a lower compensation than what you are owed and, if this settlement is accepted, it will make it much harder for you to go after greater damages.

What if the other driver does not have insurance?

Our law firm helps you get compensation when you are hit by an uninsured driver. If you are owed damages, we will help you work with your own insurance company to get the money you are owed.

Will my dashcam footage be useful in my case?

Absolutely. Any evidence you have related to your accident should be forwarded immediately to your lawyer.

Practice Areas

  • Smithfield, NC Auto Accident Lawyers
  • Smithfield, NC Immigration Lawyers
  • Smithfield, NC Workers’ Comp Lawyers
